DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy Aerosal® compare placebo prognosis inverse psoriasis sebopsoriasis present least one year
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Aerosal® Treatment Inverse Psoriasis Sebopsoriasis
DOC.criteria: Inverse Psoriasis Sebopsoriasis last one year At least 1 % total body surface area involvement Suspension 3 month start study systemic drug psoriasis , immunosuppressive treatment ( cyclosporin , systemic steroid ) , psoralen plus ultraviolet A irradiation ( PUVA ) ultraviolet B phototherapy ( UVB ) Patients acute bronchopulmonary disease , tuberculosis , severe hypertension , hyperthyroidism , cancer ( chemotherapy ) , intoxication , heart failure Iodine allergy Women pregnant planning become pregnant study
